comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: His correct name is Wilhelm Anton Souchon (not Sonchon) , he was a German and Ottoman admiral in World War I who commanded the Kaiserliche Marine's Mediterranean squadron in the early days of the war. His initiative made him one of the most important influences on the entry of the Ottoman Empire into World War I. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wilhelm_Souchon

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thank you B-59 for the additional information. We'll correct the spelling and add his full name to our record.
